string.name: home_matter
string.p:
This application is to facilitate victims/complainants to report crime complaints online. This application caters to complaints pertaining to crimes only with special focus on crimes against women. Complaints reported on this application are dealt by law enforcement agencies/ police based on the information available in the complaints. It is imperative to provide correct and accurate details while filing complaint for prompt action.


 Please contact local police in case of an emergency or for reporting crimes other than cyber crimes. National police helpline number is 100. National women helpline number is 181.

string.name: click_tracking_complaint
string.u: Click here to track your complaint
